Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_nnqoocto&referenceId=1_nnqoocto&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: U.S. stock index futures slide as rate bets get a boost after hawkish comments from St. Louis Federal Reserve Bank President James Bullard. Amazon staff will be allowed to work without a face covering as local regulations allow from this Thursday. U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken says Ukraine could launch an invasion at any time.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3gCdwaO
